item.title: Adding a new shop to pkbox
item.dc:creator: @santaguy santaguy
item.description:
@santaguy wrote:

  1. add the shops npc open autospawn use this there
spawn = 56	2965	3953	0	0	0	0	0	1	noob armor shop
  1. open client.java
    Search for on of you shops like get a npc shops code of ur server open client.java and use ctrl+f put the shop id there u shuld see somting like this

} else if (NPCID == 1552) { // lal santaclauss holiday stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 31; } else if (NPCID == 2262) { // dark mage rbe shp PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 32; } else if (NPCID == 260) { // wtvr the fuck this is PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66; }

  1. ur own shop add add this under the }

else if (NPCID == 56) { // armor shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; }

  1. open ‘‘shops’’ file add this
shop = 56	Noob Clothing				2	2	15348	100	15349	100	15345	100	15346	100	13592	100	1019	100	1009	100	1059	100	15156	100	15185	100	15195	100	13591	100	15310	100	15309	100	13594	100

Save and compile hope its worked for u
